desc: Just stripped from the local department, this black and white beast is ready to scare your neighbor's kids today!
condition: Performed 7 pit maneuvers and smells like the 'evidence' never made it to lockup

desc: Dream cars don't just fall from the sky, they get repossessed and it's still probably too expensive for you.
condition: The interior smells like the police car, but with class.

desc: Literally the best car we've ever seen on this lot. It's pink, it has 3 wheels, what could possibly be wrong with it.
miles: You're not buying this for the miles, let's be honest
condition: Not as bad as the Ferrari.

desc: Tired of all the Ford haters? You'll never see them, or compact cars, again!
miles: None of us could reach the steering wheel. Let's see you try.
condition: Normal wear if you consider spilled beer to be an aesthetic.

desc: Rugged, tough, durable, other macho adjectives to hype up a less than decent mid-size
condition: We can't find the clicking sound, so we just say it's the mud tires.

desc: The national sponsor of single mountain bikers.
condition: Pretty much new, just like all the mountain biking gear this future owner is rocking.

desc: Barely legal to ride on the streets, just like your...
condition: Good condition, just don't drive it down my block. The neighbor's kid will know.

desc: Beepity Bopity, my girlfriend is now your property in this slick painted Vespa.
condition: Standard paint chips and rock dings from your girlfriend's husband throwing rocks like an animal.

desc: Nothing out there is faster except for the time it took to come up with these descriptions.
condition: It's either brand new or dust on the back of a road sign, trust us.

desc: Because it was 'sold' to us at the track, we figure it will be best to sell it in the same spot, just for your convenience.
condition: It sounds good and can out race anybody willing to run you down for it.

desc: For the sensible man in a mid-life crisis
condition: It's practically new. The owner stated this did not impress the kids enough for them to move from their mother's.

desc: This nifty little rocket will literally send you and your loved one into the skies with its jet engine strapped to the bottom.
miles: Do planes track miles? Didn't think so.
condition: We bought it from San Andreas Autos and they say it needs constant repairs. It'll last longer if you stop picking fights with the army.
